chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ كَانَ لَهُ صَلاَةٌ بِاللَّيْلِ فَغَلَبَهُ عَلَيْهَا النَّوْمُ
chapter.eng-name: One who has the habit of praying at night, then sleep overwhelms him

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْمِ الرَّجُلِ الرِّضَا
chapter.eng-name: In the name of that good man

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْمِ الرَّجُلِ الرِّضَا
chapter.eng-name: In the name of that good man

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَتَى فِرَاشَهُ وَهُوَ يَنْوِي الْقِيَامَ فَنَامَ
chapter.eng-name: One who goes to bed intending to get up and pray Qiyam but he falls asleep

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَتَى فِرَاشَهُ وَهُوَ يَنْوِي الْقِيَامَ فَنَامَ
chapter.eng-name: One who goes to bed intending to get up and pray Qiyam but he falls asleep

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ يُصَلِّي مَنْ نَامَ عَنْ صَلاَةٍ، أَوْ مَنَعَهُ وَجَعٌ
chapter.eng-name: How many rak'ahs should a person pray who slept and missed (praying Qiyam Al-Lail) or was prevented from doing so by pain

chapter.ara-name: باب مَتَى يَقْضِي مَنْ نَامَ عَنْ حِزْبِهِ، مِنَ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: When should a person who slept and missed reciting his nightly portion of Qur'an make it up

chapter.ara-name: باب مَتَى يَقْضِي مَنْ نَامَ عَنْ حِزْبِهِ، مِنَ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: When should a person who slept and missed reciting his nightly portion of Qur'an make it up

chapter.ara-name: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ صَلَّى فِي الْيَوْمِ وَاللَّيْلَةِ ثِنْتَىْ عَشْرَةَ رَكْعَةً سِوَى الْمَكْتُوبَةِ وَذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ النَّاقِلِينَ فِيهِ لِخَبَرِ أُمِّ حَبِيبَةَ فِي ذَلِكَ وَالاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى عَطَاءٍ
chapter.eng-name: The reward of one who prays twelve rak'ahs apart from the prescribed prayers during the day and night
